thread.title: Jerry Marbut
thread.title_full: White Mountain Puzzles reviewed by Jerry Marbut

author: Jerry Marbut
title: Jerry Marbut
text: Bar none, White Mountain Puzzles are the best puzzles on the market. My wife and I complete one puzzle about every 10 days in our spare time. We look forward to the enjoyment and challenge of all the 1000 piece puzzles that White Mountain Puzzles has to offer.
